org.jooby.filewatcher

Class FileEventOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jooby.filewatcher.FileEventOptions

  • public class FileEventOptions
extends Object
    Allow to customize a file watch handler. You can listen for particular event kinds, apply a glob filter, recursive listening for changes and set watcher priority or modifier. Default filter watch recursively listen for all the available kinds using a HIGH modifier. This class can't be instantiated by client code. Intances of this class are provided via configuration callbacks. See FileWatcher.register(Path, Class, java.util.function.Consumer)
    Since:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    edgar

    • Method Detail

      • kind

        public FileEventOptions kind(WatchEvent.Kind<Path> kind)
        Append a kind filter. The default filter is: StandardWatchEventKinds.ENTRY_CREATE, StandardWatchEventKinds.ENTRY_DELETE and StandardWatchEventKinds.ENTRY_MODIFY.
        Parameters:
        kind - Filter type.
        Returns:
        This options.

      • recursive

        public FileEventOptions recursive(boolean recursive)
        Turn on/off watching of subfolder.
        Parameters:
        recursive - True to watch on subfolder.
        Returns:
        This options.

      • includes

        Add a path filter using glob expression, like **/*.java, etc...
        Parameters:
        expression - Glob expression.
        Returns:
        This options.

      • modifier

        public FileEventOptions modifier(WatchEvent.Modifier modifier)
        Set a watch modifier. Default is: HIGH.
        Parameters:
        modifier - Watch modifier.
        Returns:
        This options.
